meanings.definition: To surpass in power or strength.
meanings.sent1: The superhero was outpowering the villain in the epic battle.
meanings.sent2: The new engine design is outpowering the old one by a significant margin.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant outpowering the mighty elephant in a strength competition would be quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: The sun outpowering all the stars in the sky is a metaphor for its immense strength.
meanings.sent5: The roaring lion outpowering its competitors for dominance in the jungle is a vivid image.

meanings.definition: Having more power or strength than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The outpowering force of the waterfall was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The outpowering army easily defeated their opponents in battle.
meanings.sent3: The outpowering storm clouds raced across the sky, darkening the landscape.
meanings.sent4: The outpowering athlete dominated the competition with ease.
meanings.sent5: The outpowering waves crashed against the shore, showing their strength.
